Title: Requires public notice and hearing prior to any planned substantial change in service
Summary: Requires public notice and hearing prior to any planned substantial change in service; defines "substantial change in service" to mean any change in frequency of service or change in route or complete or partial closing of a passenger stop or route; outlines places where posters shall be placed.
LawCode: Add ยง1299-hhh, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring public notice and hearing prior to any planned substantial change in service of the Rochester-Genesee regional transportation authority
